resources.string:
I am to add new manuals for all who is starting creating simple and professional projects.

My library of manuals contains:

1. Java – Best free programming language for all.
2. Android – smartphones, auto etc..
3. C# - good language for scripting and performance.
4. C++ - User interface programming for business software development etc..
5. Php – web programming language.
Somehow i am solving some aspects of programming to help understand how to begin programming.
